document_data.mainbody:
ing Janos Torlath I "the Vengeful" was an Amnian monarch of the Torlath dynasty, known as the first Wizard-King of Amn.
Jhanos was the sixth son of of King Brinnaq I. His eldest brother was Esmel IV and his sole sister was Leluia.
When his sisters husband Arbas killed much of the royal family and seized the throne in 696 DR, Jhanos was abroad with his family. He returned the next year and slew the Black Usurper, becoming king himself.
